keyPolicies.policyDescription: Halve the deficit through economic growth, fair taxes, and lower priority spending.
New policies for families with young children and a new Toddler Tax Credit.
Support new industries and green jobs that help provide high-tech services and manufacturing.
Cutting waste and putting more resources into frontline services like policing, schools, childcare, and the NHS.

mentions.candidate: Pat Glass is Labour’s Candidate at the General Election.

issues.economy: Halve the deficit through economic growth, fair taxes, and lower priority spending.
issues.education: Cutting waste and putting more resources into frontline services like... schools, childcare...
issues.environment: Support new industries and green jobs...
issues.health: Cutting waste and putting more resources into frontline services... and the NHS.

leaflet.personalStatement: Pat Glass has lived in Lanchester with her husband, Bob. A mother of two grown-up sons, Pat has spent much of her life working in education.

politicalExperience.achievements: Pat has worked as an Assistant Director of Education and has been an Advisor to the Government on special educational needs. Active in her local community.
